mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment (comment_id, product_id, uid, comment_time, comment_contents) VALUES (#{commentId}, #{productId}, #{uid}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y%m%d%H%i%s"), #{commentText})

INSERT INTO tbl_comment (comment_id, product_id, uid, upper_id, comment_time, comment_contents) VALUES (#{commentId}, #{productId}, #{uid}, #{upperId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y%m%d%H%i%s"), #{replyText})
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.product_id, c.uid, c.upper_id, c.comment_time, c.comment_contents, m.user_name, m.user_rank FROM ( SELECT comment_id, product_id, uid, upper_id, comment_time, comment_contents FROM tbl_comment WHERE product_id = #{productId}) c, tbl_member m WHERE c.uid = m.uid
